text: HackerRank | Prepare Certify Compete Apply Search   1  All Contests SRBD Code Contest - 2024 (Round 2) Interesting Triplets  Interesting Triplets locked Problem Submissions Discussions Time Limit: ++ Memory Limit: Monzur has a sequence of positive integers of length . Monzur deﬁnes a triplet interesting if it satisﬁes the following conditions: and Monzur wants to know how many diﬀerent interesting triplets can he ﬁnd in his sequence. Can you help him? Input Format The ﬁrst line of input contains an integer denoting the number of test cases. Then testcases follow. The ﬁrst line of each test case contains an integer — the length of the sequence. The next line contains space separated integers — the sequence. Constraints Output Format For each test case, output a single integer, the number of diﬀerent interesting triplets. Sample Input 0 2 7 1 -1 3 1 -1 0 -3 10 -1 -1 -2 2 0 1 0 3 1 0 Sample Output 0 9 16 Submissions: 276     Interview Prep | Blog | Scoring | Environment | FAQ | About Us | Support | Careers | Terms Of Service | Privacy Policy | Max Score: 100 Rate This Challenge: More      Test against custom input  ⚙C  Line: 1 Col: 1 Run Code Submit CodeUpload Code as File #include <stdio.h> #include <string.h> #include <math.h> #include <stdlib.h> int main() {    /* Enter your code here.
